text: My 10-month pitbull loves this, but she chewed through the rope on this toy within her third day of having it.  That's a pretty short life for $14 so for those of you who have had the same thing happened here's what I did: forget the rope and put a tennis ball or two inside with kibble.  It's not exactly a tug jug anymore, but it does take a little work to get the food out.
